pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto ucce mañce sayati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.1.3: Atha kho bhagavā sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ senāsanacārikaṃ āhiṇḍanto yenāyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa vihāro tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.1.4: Addasā kho āyasmā upanando sakyaputto bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.1.7: Atha kho bhagavā tatova paṭinivattitvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.1.9: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.1.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.1.11: “Navaṃ pana bhikkhunā mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā kārayamānena aṭṭhaṅgulapādakaṃ kāretabbaṃ sugataṅgulena, aññatra heṭṭhimāya aṭaniyā; taṃ atikkāmayato chedanakaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.4: cattāro mañcā— masārako, bundikābaddho, kuḷīrapādako, āhaccapādako.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.7: cattāri pīṭhāni— masārakaṃ, bundikābaddhaṃ, kuḷīrapādakaṃ, āhaccapādakaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.11: Aṭṭhaṅgulapādakaṃ kāretabbaṃ sugataṅgulena, aññatra heṭṭhimāya aṭaniyāti
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.13: taṃ atikkāmetvā karoti vā kārāpeti vā, payoge dukkaṭaṃ, paṭilābhena chinditvā pācittiyaṃ desetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.14: Attanā vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.15: Attanā vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.16: Parehi vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.17: Parehi vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.18: Aññassatthāya karoti vā kārāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.19: Aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
